attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app glitches SO MUCH that i can’t even open it! i wanted to learn more about our president but i just wasted my time downloading an app that doesn’t even work? i’m honestly disappointed and upset that i can’t have an easy way to get updates !! do NOT download this app!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DON’T GET IT
attributes.review: This is THE WORST app I have ever used. The interface is HORRIFIC. It DOES NOT work. You would think that the President of the United States, who LOVES and CARES for his supporters would have an app that actually WORKED. SAD. Just SAD. It was the WORST decision I have EVER made. It’s slow, it lags it’s just TERRIBLE. I have NEVER in my LIFE had an app that works LESS than this!!!!!!!!!!! SHAME!!!

attributes.title: Worst app EVER
attributes.review: Can’t fathom why this app would ever exist considering supporting trump means you are a racist, homophobic, overall terrible human. Could you imagine being caught with this app on your phone? I would bully that person into therapy bro. Only the scum of the earth would download this app to keep up with Trump. Anyways, hate this app.

attributes.title: AWFUL! GOT SPIED ON
attributes.review: just terrible. it stole all my banking information and then hacked into my home security system. now trump has seen me eating a whole tub of ice cream half naked. if you want to stay private in your own home don’t download! the app store should take this down if they care about remotely anyone at all! DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Trump 2020✨🦋🧚‍♀️On A Gravestone🤪🤩😀
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i was going to support our orange cheeto puff😋but i was very disappointed😖it was very slow and kept sending me to adult websites😢😭😖and it said that it detected that i was mexican and will deport me and my family if i didn’t delete it😨🤮👿😷🤒. very disappointed in you daddie trumpy👿😭😔😪

attributes.title: 😡😡🤬WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: first of all, right when i opened the app, an ugly fat orange skinned person showed up. YUCK! not to mention, this app has tons of glitches and even managed to delete all of my apps on my phone! it’s also managed to hack all of my bank accounts and security account! plz don’t download this app👎👎

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: Trash app, filled with fake news. I’m pretty sure it took all of my private information so that’s fun. Structured like a 10 year old designed it, so maybe the president had a hand in it, but can’t imagine him actually working. Don’t download, it’s a virus waiting to happen 🧚🏻🧚🏻

attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I support our president TRUMP 2020 but the moment I downloaded this app so many bad things started to happen. My phone started to glitch and everything was slow, I get so many notifications and my phones storage is almost 0 by downloading this app. Please do not get this app. TRUMP 2020 ALL LIVES MATTER

attributes.title: Don't Bother!
attributes.review: If I could rate this below a one star, I would! The moment I downloaded and tried to opening it, my phone started glitching. I've tried deleting and reinstalling but my phone continues to run slow. Like it's eating too much energy. This app is not worth it!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I got on the app and it keeps sending me notifications to send Trump money. I thought he was rich and had all kinds of money from his businesses. Oh wait I forgot that most of those businesses went bankrupt because he doesn’t know how to own and business. Ok I understand now😕.
